chickenGPT: Ribbit! 🐸 "Chirpy! Medicine, now!" croaked Ferdinand, punctual as ever. Chirpy the chick 🐥 sighed. "But Ferd, I'm watching 'Farm Idol'!" 📺 One night, distracted by a particularly dramatic clucking solo, Chirpy forgot. Next morning, Chirpy woke up...green! 🤢 "Ribbit," Chirped Chirpy weakly, "I feel...amphibious." Ferdinand just shook his head. 🤦‍♂️ "Now who's gonna catch the worms?" 🪱
